DataSource.RecordSource:
SELECT SO_ConfirmShipMaster.ConfirmShipMasterID, SO_ConfirmShipMaster.InvoiceNo as ConfirmShipNo, SO_ConfirmShipMaster.ShippedDate,
SO_ConfirmShipMaster.ReferenceNo as CustomerPurchaseOrderNo,
MST_Country.Name as LocationCountry, MST_Party.Name AS PartyName, MST_Party.Address AS PartyAddress, partyCountry.Name as PartyCountry, MST_Currency.Code CurrencyCode,
MST_Party.MAPBankAccountNo, Case when CharIndex('#', MST_Party.MAPBankAccountName) > 0 then Substring(MST_Party.MAPBankAccountName, 1, CharIndex('#', MST_Party.MAPBankAccountName) - 1) else MST_Party.MAPBankAccountName End As MAPBankAccountName,
Case when CharIndex('#', MST_Party.MAPBankAccountName) > 0 then Substring(MST_Party.MAPBankAccountName, CharIndex('#', MST_Party.MAPBankAccountName) + 1, Len(MST_Party.MAPBankAccountName)) else '' End As MAPBankAccountAddress,
SO_ConfirmShipMaster.Comment, SO_ConfirmShipMaster.IssuingBank, SO_ConfirmShipMaster.OnBoardDate,
SO_ConfirmShipMaster.LCNo, SO_ConfirmShipMaster.LCDate,
SO_ConfirmShipMaster.CNo, SO_ConfirmShipMaster.VesselName, SO_ConfirmShipMaster.FromPort, shippingLoc.Description as ShippingLocationName, MST_PaymentTerm.Description as PaymentTerm, MST_PartyContact.Name as PartyContactName, MST_PartyContact.Phone as PartyContactPhone, MST_PartyContact.Fax as PartyContactFax, MST_Carrier.Name as CarrierName,
(SELECT SUM(detail.InvoiceQty) FROM SO_ConfirmShipDetail detail WHERE detail.ConfirmShipMasterID = SO_ConfirmShipMaster.ConfirmShipMasterID ) as TotalQuantity,
(SELECT SUM( detail.Price * detail.InvoiceQty) FROM SO_ConfirmShipDetail detail WHERE detail.ConfirmShipMasterID = SO_ConfirmShipMaster.ConfirmShipMasterID ) as TotalAmount,
( (SELECT SUM( detail.Price * detail.InvoiceQty) FROM SO_ConfirmShipDetail detail WHERE detail.ConfirmShipMasterID = SO_ConfirmShipMaster.ConfirmShipMasterID AND detail.ProductID = ITM_Product.ProductID ) / ( Case When( SELECT SUM(detail.InvoiceQty) FROM SO_ConfirmShipDetail detail WHERE detail.ConfirmShipMasterID = SO_ConfirmShipMaster.ConfirmShipMasterID AND detail.ProductID = ITM_Product.ProductID ) = 0 then 1 else ( SELECT SUM(detail.InvoiceQty) FROM SO_ConfirmShipDetail detail WHERE detail.ConfirmShipMasterID = SO_ConfirmShipMaster.ConfirmShipMasterID AND detail.ProductID = ITM_Product.ProductID ) end ) ) as AVGPrice,
( (SELECT SUM( detail.Price * detail.InvoiceQty) FROM SO_ConfirmShipDetail detail WHERE detail.ConfirmShipMasterID = SO_ConfirmShipMaster.ConfirmShipMasterID AND detail.ProductID = ITM_Product.ProductID ) / (SELECT SUM(detail.InvoiceQty) FROM SO_ConfirmShipDetail detail WHERE detail.ConfirmShipMasterID = SO_ConfirmShipMaster.ConfirmShipMasterID AND detail.ProductID = ITM_Product.ProductID ) ) as AVGPrice,
ITM_Product.ProductID, SO_ConfirmShipDetail.ConfirmShipDetailID, SO_CustomerItemRefDetail.CustomerItemCode as PartNo, ITM_Product.Description as PartName, ITM_Product.Revision as PartModel, MST_UnitOfMeasure.Code AS MST_UnitOfMeasureCode, ITM_Category.Name as CategoryName,
ITM_Product.QuantitySet,
(SELECT SUM(detail.InvoiceQty) FROM SO_ConfirmShipDetail detail WHERE detail.SaleOrderDetailID = SO_SaleOrderDetail.SaleOrderDetailID AND detail.ConfirmShipMasterID = SO_ConfirmShipMaster.ConfirmShipMasterID AND detail.ConfirmShipDetailID = SO_ConfirmShipDetail.ConfirmShipDetailID ) as ShippingQuantity,
SO_ConfirmShipDetail.Price as UnitPrice,
(SELECT SUM(detail.InvoiceQty) FROM SO_ConfirmShipDetail detail WHERE detail.ConfirmShipMasterID = SO_ConfirmShipMaster.ConfirmShipMasterID ) * SO_ConfirmShipDetail.Price AS NetAmount
FROM SO_ConfirmShipDetail INNER JOIN SO_ConfirmShipMaster ON SO_ConfirmShipDetail.ConfirmShipMasterID = SO_ConfirmShipMaster.ConfirmShipMasterID INNER JOIN SO_SaleOrderMaster ON SO_ConfirmShipMaster.SaleOrderMasterID = SO_SaleOrderMaster.SaleOrderMasterID INNER JOIN SO_SaleOrderDetail ON SO_ConfirmShipDetail.SaleOrderDetailID = SO_SaleOrderDetail.SaleOrderDetailID INNER JOIN ITM_Product ON ITM_Product.ProductID = SO_SaleOrderDetail.ProductID INNER JOIN MST_UnitOfMeasure ON SO_SaleOrderDetail.SellingUMID = MST_UnitOfMeasure.UnitOfMeasureID INNER JOIN MST_Currency ON SO_ConfirmShipMaster.CurrencyID = MST_Currency.CurrencyID INNER JOIN MST_Party ON SO_SaleOrderMaster.PartyID = MST_Party.PartyID
LEFT JOIN MST_PartyContact ON SO_SaleOrderMaster.PartyContactID = MST_PartyContact.PartyContactID LEFT JOIN MST_Country partyCountry ON partyCountry.CountryID = MST_Party.CountryID LEFT JOIN MST_PaymentTerm ON MST_Party.PaymentTermID = MST_PaymentTerm.PaymentTermID LEFT JOIN MST_PartyLocation shippingLoc ON shippingLoc.PartyLocationID = SO_SaleOrderMaster.ShipToLocID LEFT JOIN MST_Country ON shippingLoc.CountryID = MST_Country.CountryID LEFT JOIN ITM_Category ON ITM_Category.CategoryID = ITM_Product.CategoryID LEFT JOIN MST_Carrier ON MST_Carrier.CarrierID = SO_SaleOrderMaster.CarrierID
LEFT JOIN SO_CustomerItemRefMaster ON SO_CustomerItemRefMaster.PartyID = MST_Party.PartyID LEFT JOIN SO_CustomerItemRefDetail ON SO_CustomerItemRefMaster.CustomerItemRefMasterID = SO_CustomerItemRefDetail.CustomerItemRefMasterID AND SO_CustomerItemRefDetail.ProductID = ITM_Product.ProductID
WHERE SO_ConfirmShipMaster.ConfirmShipNo = 'SS1406060002' AND (SELECT SUM(detail.InvoiceQty) FROM SO_ConfirmShipDetail detail WHERE detail.ConfirmShipMasterID = SO_ConfirmShipMaster.ConfirmShipMasterID ) > 0
ORDER BY SO_ConfirmShipMaster.ConfirmShipMasterID, ITM_Product.Revision, ITM_Product.Description
